public class FileBasedTextResourceCollection

Implementation of a resource collection referring to resources in the local filesystem.

Method Detail

register

public static void register(TextResourceResolver resolver,
                            String prefix,
                            File root,
                            String sourceURI,
                            Charset charset,
                            long maxAge)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
Registers a file-based collection with the given resolver.

Parameters:
resolver - the resolver with which the collection will be registered
prefix - the common path prefix under which the collection's resources will be mounted
root - assigned to root
sourceURI - assigned to TextResourceCollection.source
charset - assigned to TextResourceCollection.charset
maxAge - assigned to TextResourceCollection.maxAge
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - in case the provided file is not a root or cannot be read

resolve

public TextResource resolve(String relativePath)
                     throws IOException,
                            IllegalArgumentException
Description copied from class: TextResourceCollection
Resolves a path that is relative to the common base path of this collection.

Specified by:
resolve in class TextResourceCollection
Parameters:
relativePath - the relative path
Returns:
the corresponding text-based resource
Throws:
IOException
IllegalArgumentException - if the path cannot be resolved
